parking.group6.csc413.projectmap

Class ConnectDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • parking.group6.csc413.projectmap.ConnectDB

  • public class ConnectDB
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    These functions are used to manage the SQLite database. Basic functionality includes adding, deleting, and searching for favorite addresses.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    csc 413 group 6
